contents:
Installing Node Using the Node Version Manager curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.38.0/install.sh | bash This will install the nvm script to your user account. To use it, you must first source your .bashrc file:
nvm list Install latest
nvm install lts/hydrogen NodeJS Version aktivieren
nvm use lts/hydrogen
title: NoteJS install
